definition: to praise sb in his presence
see 畫地為牢|画地为牢[hua4 di4 wei2 lao2]
to reach everywhere/to stop at nothing/to do one's utmost
Chakravarti raja (Sanskrit: King of Kings)/emperor in Hindu mythology
lit. to burn both fragrant orchids and stinking weeds (idiom); fig. to destroy indiscriminately the noble and common/the rain falls on the just and unjust alike
not shaken by poverty/to preserve one's ambitions although destitute

the Four Noble Truths (Budd.), namely: all life is suffering 苦, the cause of suffering is desire 集, emancipation comes only by eliminating passions 滅|灭, the way 道 to emancipation is the Eight-fold Noble Way 八正道/also called 四諦|四谛
lit. to have only nine meals in thirty days (idiom)/fig. (of a family) on the brink of starvation/in dire straits
(cf Book of Songs) How to fashion an ax handle? You need an ax/fig. to follow a principle/fig. to act as matchmaker
